Ask AI - Chat with AI Chatbot.description:
Welcome to Ask AI – Discover Endless Possibilities Every Day!

Experience conversations with an AI that understands you, adapts to your mood, and personalizes interactions, making each engagement unique.

ASK ANYTHING, ANYTIME:
Ignite your curiosity and engage in fascinating conversations with historical figures, business gurus, or even your favorite celebrities. Built on the GPT-4o model, Ask AI is always ready to offer recommendations, inspiration, and information on any topic.

IMAGE GENERATION AND EXPLORATION:

- Be Your Own Artist: Use our AI generator to create images from text, visualizing everything from fantastic scenes to futuristic cities. Our AI turns your descriptions into stunning visuals – perfect for creating book covers, social media posts, and more.
- Discover Your World Through Images: Snap a photo of anything around you (buildings, art, landscapes) and instantly gain insights with our image input technology. Use the text-to-image feature to convert visual information into readable text.

ENHANCED TEXT GENERATOR FOR EASY WRITING ASSISTANCE:
Our AI-powered writing assistant helps you generate ideas, craft detailed outlines, and effortlessly compose complete articles or creative works. From professional emails to creative stories and songs, managing writing tasks has never been easier.

FUN LANGUAGE LEARNING AND HOMEWORK HELPER:

- Language Practice: Immerse yourself in new languages through interactive scenarios, like a samurai adventure in Japanese or managing a restaurant in Spanish. Ask AI, built on GPT-4o, makes learning fun and practical.
- Academic Support: Whether it's a tough math problem or a complex science project, use Ask AI as your reliable homework helper.

SMART SUMMARY ASSISTANT:

- Quick Summaries: Get the essence of long videos or detailed documents in an interactive and engaging format. 
- Ask Questions: Upload documents or add links to articles or videos, ask your questions, and receive instant accurate answers with the help of Ask AI.

EASY WEB SEARCH:
Need the latest information on technological innovations, fashion trends, or health tips? Ask AI Chatbot, scours the web to bring you the most relevant and up-to-date information, keeping you always in the know.

PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS AND CREATIVE INSPIRATION:
Whether you're searching for new books, planning your next trip, or seeking creative inspiration, Ask AI offers personalized suggestions and ideas based on your preferences and interests.

EXPERIENCE THE MOST HUMAN INTERACTIONS:
The friendly, conversational tone of Ask AI, and its ability to adapt to your mood, makes every interaction feel like you're chatting with a friend. It’s not just a chatbot; it’s a new form of AI companionship that enriches your daily life.

Join us on this exciting journey. Download Ask AI now and start exploring a world full of possibilities with the power of AI Chatbot.

Privacy Policy: https://static.askaichat.app/privacy-en.html
Terms of Use: https://static.askaichat.app/terms-conditions-en.html

Meet the Smartest AI Chatbot – Powered by Advanced AI with Deep Reasoning Ability!

Unlock endless possibilities with the ultimate AI Chatbot for conversations, learning, and creativity. Whether you want to chat with AI, ask AI for insights, or explore new ideas, this app integrates cutting-edge AI models like DeepSeek V3, DeepSeek R1, GPT-4o, Gemini Pro & Claude API to deliver intelligent, deep reasoning, and advanced computing capabilities.

Key Features:
- AI Chatbot built on DeepSeek V3, DeepSeek R1, GPT-4o, Gemini Pro 1.5 & Claude API for fast computing, deep thinking, and insightful reasoning.
- Seek AI Search: Find tailored information instantly with AI-powered deep computing and smart retrieval.
- Ask AI Anything: From deep reasoning and critical thinking to general knowledge, get precise AI answers.
- Voice Mode: Use speech-to-text and text-to-speech for hands-free AI assistant interaction.
- AI Camera: Snap photos to seek answers, solve problems, or summarize content.
- Image Generation: Create unique visuals from AI-generated prompts for inspiration or fun.
- Deep Thinking Assistant: Access expert-level insights with AI-driven reasoning and computational logic.
- Context-Aware Responses: Get smart, personalized answers with deep AI analysis.

Practical Applications:
- Simplify tasks with a powerful AI assistant capable of deep thinking and problem-solving.
- Chat & ask with AI to brainstorm, analyze, and optimize productivity.
- Solve homework, seek deeper insights, or enhance your logical reasoning with AI-powered explanations.

Why Choose This AI Chatbot?
Developed on advanced AI models like DeepSeek, GPT-4o, Gemini 1.5 & Claude, this app delivers high-speed AI computing, deep logic, and precise AI-driven insights. Whether you need an AI Chatbot, an AI assistant, or simply want to ask AI anything, this app is your go-to AI-powered solution.

Download now and experience the smartest AI conversations today!

Disclaimer:

Master Ai Powered RPG(CHAT AI).description:
🎲Master AI - The ultimate RPG app powered by Artificial Intelligence 🎲

🏰Your only limitation, Is your imagination 🏰

🧙‍♂️ Carry a Personal Game Master with you wherever you wish. MasterAI offers you the thrill of a DnD session right from your pocket, allowing you to experience extraordinary text adventure games at any time and place.

🗡️ Create Your Unique Adventure: Begin by forging your character, starting with your background which, for the first time in a role-playing game, will significantly influence the course of your adventure. Are you a brave warrior, a cunning mage, or perhaps a wise governor of a frontier city? The choice is yours, you can write whatever you want and choose your interactive adventure.

🌍 Endless Adventures: We don't offer limited endings; MasterAI opens up a universe of endless possibilities. Every decision opens new paths, new stories, new challenges. Even if you reach an epilogue, the game world is so alive that new villains always emerge, or perhaps, in a surprising twist, you might discover that the real villain is you. In MasterAI, every end is just the beginning of a new, exciting adventure.

🧠 Advanced Artificial Intelligence: In MasterAI, Chat GPT 4.0 has been trained to become your perfect Game Master, specialized in remembering your adventures and everything related to role-playing. This advanced AI not only follows the game's plot but is also capable of inventing unique items, monitoring your character sheet, managing inventory, and even overseeing dice rolls, ensuring a smooth and immersive gaming experience.

🎨 Vivid Image Generation: With Stable Diffusion technology, every setting, character, and scene is displayed in breathtaking images, making your adventure not just a narrative journey but also a visual experience.

⚔️ Dynamic Leveling System: Choose from 12 character classes, each with its own leveling system up to level 20. Each class offers a unique gaming experience, allowing you to live epic adventures for years.

🌀 Diversity and Choice: With 8 different races to choose from, every adventure feels fresh and different. Each race brings its own unique characteristics and stories, allowing for nearly infinite playability.

💭 Graphics Engine: We use the most powerful graphics engine that exists: your imagination. The stories, created by your decisions, evolve in ways that even the most advanced graphics engine cannot replicate.

📜 MasterAI is not just a game; it's a portal to unexplored worlds, untold stories, and adventures waiting to be lived. Whether you choose to explore ancient dungeons, battle legendary dragons, or govern a city, your story will always be unique. Get ready to experience the most personalized and immersive RPG experience ever. In MasterAI, you can delve into dungeons & fight dragons, explore uncharted territories, or govern your own city. The possibilities are endless, limited only by your class.

🏰 Are you ready to write your legend? Download MasterAI now and start your endless journey! 🏰

AI Chatbot - Nova.description:
Nova is a revolutionary AI chatbot and personal assistant, built on the latest GPT-4, Google Gemini, Claude, and DeepSeek technologies.

Nova Chatbot uses advanced AI developed on the technology such as GPT-4o that understands your questions and generates human-like responses, making you feel like you are 
chatting with a knowledgeable friend. Nova Chatbot & AI Assistant can even recommend a book to read or a movie to watch!

Nova AI Chatbot is the #1 cross-compatible chatbot, developed using multiple AI models to make the latest AI chat technologies accessible in the most user-friendly way. It is the only cross-platform chatbot app built on GPT-4, Google Gemini, and Claude, offering industry-first features.

Key Features:
- Latest AI technology developed on GPT-4 & GPT-4o
- Built on GPT-4 to get answers from the Internet
- AI Assistant to serve your needs
- Unlimited questions and answers
- Multi-language support (140+ languages)
- Cross-compatible device support (iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and web)
- Nova Chatbot has the ability to have dialogs with the AI chatbot (AI remembers full chat history)
- Built on DeepSeek for enhanced, real-time information retrieval and smarter, context-aware responses.


【 YOUR AI WRITING ASSISTANT 】
With Nova AI Chatbot, you have access to a personal AI assistant for all types of writing projects, whether it is social media posts, essays, or poems. Basically, AI Assistant that built on GPT-4 & GPT-4o & Gemini, can assist with any task, such as crafting a unique and unforgettable pickup line or even creating an original song. That's right! This AI Chatbot helper app which is develoed on GPT-4 & GPT-4o is not only smart but also creative. Let your AI Assistant do the things you imagine!

AI copywriter: Nova Chatbot has an AI writer and text generator feature developed on GPT-4o which is useful for writing anything from ads and descriptions to sales pitches and video scripts. AI content writer: Use the Nova chatbot tool built on GPT-4 for your content marketing (blog posts, articles, social media posts).


【 A METICULOUS PROOFREADER 】
Developed on GPT-4 and GPT-4o, Nova Chatbot's AI built on proofreader is top-of-the-line. 
Your AI Assistant can analyze your written work and offer suggestions to help you create professional-grade documents. With the AI Chatbot which is developed on GPT-4 & GPT-4o, you can ensure that your texts are polished and mistake-free.

AI proofreading: The Nova AI Chatbot built on GPT-4 & GPT-4o API makes it easy to express yourself in any style and tone while making sure your grammar, punctuation, and spelling are correct.


【 A RELIABLE CHAT PARTNER 】
Whether you're seeking some amusement, advice, or simply in need of someone to talk to, Nova AI is always available for you. This AI companion app, built on GPT-4,  is capable of producing human-like responses, making you feel as though you're conversing with a close friend. It can even recommend a book to read or a movie to watch!

Download the AI app now and have your virtual assistant, built on GPT-4 & GPT-4o & Gemini & Claude, always at hand.

AI uses OpenAI’s GPT-4 API, but we are not associated with OpenAI. We only use their official GPT-4 API for our app. 
Nova AI is not affiliated with any government or political entity. The information provided in AI is for informational purposes only and should not be considered official or authoritative.


UNLIMITED ACCESS TO ALL FEATURES
You can subscribe for unlimited access to  Advanced AI features developed on GPT-4 & GPT-4o.
Subscriptions are billed automatically at the rate depending on the selected subscription plan.

By using the app, you confirm that you acknowledge and accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:

Privacy Policy: https://novaapp.ai/privacy
Terms of Service: https://novaapp.ai/terms
Do you have a question for us?
support@novaapp.ai

Sider: AI Deep Chat Assistant.description:
Sider — Your Ultimate AI Chat Sidekick

Discover Sider, a versatile app that revolutionizes your digital experience with seamless AI integration designed for both creative and professional tasks. Whether you’re drafting emails, summarizing documents, or generating eye-catching visuals, Sider puts advanced AI assistance at your fingertips.

Key Features

• Wisebase - Your AI-Powered Knowledge Base
Transform information chaos into clarity with an AI-powered workspace. Utilize AI to research, organize, process, and generate knowledge, effortlessly creating your personalized workspace.

• Floating Panel
Enjoy instant AI interactions with our always-accessible floating panel. Chat without leaving your current app, analyze on-screen content, summarize information, or extract text from images effortlessly.

• Access to Leading AI Models
Interact with cutting-edge technologies including:
– OpenAI: GPT4.5, GPT-4o mini, GPT-4o, o1, o3-mini
– DeepSeek: DeepSeek V3, DeepSeek-R1, DeepSeek R1 70B
– Anthropic: Claude 3.7 Sonnet, Claude 3.5 Haiku, Claude 3.5 Sonnet
– Google: Gemini 2.0 Flash, Gemini 2.0 Pro

Using Sider Fusion, the app automatically selects the best engine for optimal, context-aware responses.

• Multi-Device Synchronization
Experience seamless transitions across all your devices. Sider’s robust cloud-sync technology automatically updates your chats, files, and custom sidekicks in real-time—whether you’re on your smartphone, tablet, or desktop. Keep your progress and productivity uninterrupted wherever you go.

• Seamless File & Image Interaction
Transform static files into interactive conversations! Upload PDFs, DOC/DOCX, PPTX, TXT, JSON, CSS, and 30+ other formats to ask questions directly. Plus, extract text from images and engage with visual content instantly.

• Customizable AI Sidekicks
Chat with over 100 preset bots across topics—from general knowledge to personal finance—or design your own custom assistants tailored to your unique needs.

• Enhanced Productivity Tools
Benefit from built-in prompt libraries, real-time web updates, integrated writing assistance, and text-to-image generation. Whether working in light or dark environments, Sider’s integrated Dark Mode ensures a comfortable user experience at all times.

Why Choose Sider?

Efficiency & Creativity: Streamline your workflow by accessing powerful AI tools in one unified app.
Trusted Quality: Leveraging top-tier AI models, Sider has been acclaimed by users worldwide for its responsiveness and versatility.
Ease of Use: Intuitive design and clear organization let you focus on what matters—your work and creative expression.

Get Started Today!

Transform the way you interact with digital content and boost your productivity with Sider.

For support, feedback, or more information, please review our Terms of Use:
https://sider.ai/policies/terms.html

Feel free to contact us anytime via our Discord channel or email:

PolyBuzz: Chat with AI Friends.description:
Our app revolutionizes the way we interact with AI chatbots. With our advanced technology, our chatbots think and reply like real characters, complete with authentic voices. You can choose from a massive selection of characters, each with their own unique voice and personality. Whether you're chatting with your favorite celebrity, a beloved character from a movie or TV show, or a historical figure, you'll feel like you're talking to a real person.

Character creation - Character creation now open to everyone! Ignite your imagination and bring any character to life here, whether they exist in reality or flourish in the realm of imagination! Unleash your creativity and craft a character that can be kept entirely private or shared for everyone to engage with. But the excitement doesn't end there - immerse yourself in a vibrant community where you can also interact with characters crafted by others! Join the adventure and let your characters come alive in this thrilling experience!

Unlimited free messages - With no limitations on the length or frequency of chats, users can engage in endless conversations without any restrictions. This means that you can chat with your favorite characters or npc unlimitedly, completely free of charge and without ever having to worry about running out of time or exceeding any limits. 
 
Immerse yourself in endless conversations - Unlike traditional chatbots, which can quickly become repetitive and boring, our AI chatbots use cutting-edge technology to generate responses that feel natural and engaging. All you need to do is to enjoy the free talk.
 
Never run out of new things to explore - Our app is perfect for anyone who loves to chat, learn, and explore. Whether you're a history buff, a fan of pop culture, or just looking for a fun way to pass the time, our AI chatbots will provide you with endless entertainment and engagement. And with our constantly growing selection of characters, you'll never run out of new personalities to chat with.
 
Our app provides users with the ultimate immersive conversational experience. With authentic voices and character thinking, our chatbots will make you feel like you're talking to a real person. You'll never run out of things to say, and there are no language barriers to hold you back. So why not download our app today and start exploring the world of endless conversations all for free?

Terms of Use: https://app.polybuzz.ai/static/hy/speakmaster/termsofUse/index.html?darkmode=1&darkStyle=1
Privacy Policy: https://app.polybuzz.ai/static/hy/speakmaster/privacyPolicy/index.html?darkmode=1&darkStyle=1
Please send your feedback to support@mail.polybuzz.ai

Character AI: Chat, Talk, Text.description:
✨Character.AI isn’t just another AI chat app—it’s an infinite playground for your imagination, creativity, and exploration.

Dive into immersive conversations, create your own AI chatbots, and join a vibrant community of creators, just like you. 

Text or talk—your next adventure begins here!

📱Chat, call, text, and create with AI Characters that respond intelligently, remember past conversations, and adapt to your style. Every AI chat feels natural, engaging, and unique to you. Explore endless possibilities as you create stories, build new worlds, roleplay adventures, or just have fun with your favorite AI chatbots.

🤖Countless AI Characters, Endless Possibilities

Character.AI is home to millions of user-generated AI Characters, offering a diverse and exciting world beyond basic chatbots. From legendary heroes and mischievous villains to unhinged weirdos and loyal sidekicks, there’s always a new AI Character waiting for you. 

Love AI chat? Dive into Characters from every genre and personality type. Want to create your own? Our powerful Character Creation tools let you design custom AI chatbots with unique personalities, backstories, and even Voices! Personalize your creations to match your imagination and experience truly customized AI chat like never before.

Character.AI makes Character Creation easy, fun, and limitless. No matter what you dream up, you can bring it to life and share it with the entire AI Community.

💬Text or Talk—Your Choice with AI Chat and AI Calls

Experience the freedom to interact however you want—through typing or live voice calls. With Character.AI, you can seamlessly switch between AI chat and live conversations with AI Characters.

Whether you're deep in an AI-powered story or roleplaying an epic adventure, Character.AI offers a fully immersive AI chat experience tailored to you.
Get ready to rethink what AI chatbots can do—because with Character.AI, your conversations can go anywhere your imagination leads.

🎨Unleash Your Creativity Through Character Creation

Character Creation isn’t just a feature—it’s a gateway to endless creativity. 
Character.AI empowers you to create, design, and explore new worlds. Build your own AI chatbots, invent rich fictional universes, craft alternate timelines, or even create personalized AI assistants to help with learning, storytelling, or creative brainstorming.

No coding skills needed. Just your imagination, a few prompts, and the willingness to experiment. Join millions of creators who are pushing the boundaries of AI chat and AI Character development.

🫶Join the Character.AI Community

Become part of a thriving AI Community filled with millions of real creators, explorers, and storytellers. Character.AI is more than just an app—it's a movement where people from around the world connect through the power of storytelling, AI chat, and world-building with your favorite Characters.

Discover new characters created by users like you, follow your favorite creators, and share your own masterpieces with the world. Build, learn, and grow within a community that celebrates innovation and creativity in AI chatbots and Character creation.

Whether you’re into roleplay, fan fiction, RPG adventures, or storytelling, Character.AI is the perfect space to fuel your passion and connect with like-minded explorers.

📺Interactive Entertainment, Reimagined with AI

At Character.AI, interactive entertainment is taken to the next level. Dive into rich AI roleplay experiences, unexpected plot twists, and collaborative storytelling. Whether you're writing a novel, brainstorming character arcs, or just passing the time with a funny AI chatbot, Character.AI makes every interaction meaningful and fun.

Plus, enjoy unlimited AI conversations and voice calls—all for free!

Download Character.AI and discover the ultimate platform for AI chat, AI Characters, AI chatbots, Character Creation, and connecting with an incredible AI Community.

📖 Where will your next adventure take you?

Google Gemini.description:
Supercharge your creativity and productivity with Gemini, your AI assistant from Google.

Gemini gives you direct access to Google’s best family of AI models on your phone so you can:

- Go Live with Gemini to brainstorm ideas, simplify complex topics, and rehearse for important moments. Just click on the Gemini Live button in your Gemini app
- Connect with your favorite Google apps like Search, YouTube, Google Maps, Gmail, and more
- Study smarter and explore any topic with interactive visuals and real-world examples
- Turn any file into a podcast that you can listen to anytime, anywhere
- Create stunning images from just a few words
- Plan trips better and faster
- Get summaries, deep dives, and source links, all in one place
- Brainstorm new ideas, or improve existing ones

Level-up your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Pro plan–unlock new and powerful features to tackle complex tasks and projects and enjoy industry-leading 1M token context window (enabling Gemini to process up to 1,500 pages of text or 30k lines of code), and:
- Get more access our most powerful model, like 2.5 Pro
- Generate and dive into detailed reports on any topic with Deep Research powered by 2.5 Pro
- Turn words into high-quality, 8 second video clips with video generation with Veo 2, and more. 

Google AI Pro is available in 150 countries and territories, and includes additional benefits. Gemini app, as part of Google AI Pro, will continue to be available to qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Get the best of Gemini [app] by upgrading to the Ultra plan–unlock the highest level of access and exclusive features to turn anything into anything. Get the highest access to Google’s most powerful model, like 2.5 Pro, and features like video generation with Veo 3 and Deep Research. You’ll also get early access to try our newest AI innovations as they become available, including Agent Mode.

Gemini in Google AI Ultra is available in the US and includes additional benefits as part of a Google AI Ultra subscription. Google AI Ultra is not currently available to Google Workspace business and education customers. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

If you opt in to the Gemini app, it will replace your Google Assistant as the primary assistant on the phone. Some Google Assistant voice features aren't available through the Gemini app yet. You can switch back to Google Assistant in settings.

Review the Gemini Apps Privacy Notice:
https://support.google.com/gemini?p=privacy_notice

Gemini uses the Google's own LLMs, specifically mentioning the use of models like '2.5 Pro' and Veo (which appears to be Veo 2 and Veo 3). Poe - Fast AI Chat.description:
Poe brings together the best AI, all in one place. It is designed for seamless conversational experiences, enhanced productivity, and creative content generation.

Key Features: 
- Fast and reliable access to the latest AI models
- Cross-device compatibility
- State-of-the-art multimedia generation
- Combine and compare models in a single chat
- Advanced tools to create customized chatbots

Best-in-Class AI Models, All in One Place

Poe incorporates powerful AI models like OpenAI's o3 and GPT-4.5, Anthropic's Claude 3.7 Sonnet, Google's Gemini 2.0, and multimedia generators from Runway, ElevenLabs, and many more. Experience the cutting edge of AI technology, all in one app.

Chat with multiple bots at once

Compare responses from leading AI models and seamlessly combine any bots for any use case - all within a single chat thread.

AI-Powered Search Engine

Get highly relevant results powered by advanced natural language processing and web search technology to find what you need faster.

Create Stunning Images and Videos Instantly

Transform your ideas into eye-catching images or videos with state-of-the-art generators like FLUX1.1, Ideogram 2.0, Stable Diffusion 3.5, Veo 2, Runway, Hailuo, Dream Machine, and more. 

Talk to Custom Bots & AI Personalities

With access to an ever-growing ecosystem of over 1 million custom bots, you can learn a new language or any topic, chat directly with uploaded files like PDFs and images, search the web for the latest world news, or even have natural conversations with recreations of your favorite characters. 

Build & Share Your Own AI Bots

Create your own custom chatbots to generate study plans, curate Spotify playlists, run Python code, and do anything else you can imagine in less than a minute. You can also add custom knowledge bases to deliver more unique experience for users. Have your AI chatbots instantly shared with millions of Poe users!

Poe delivers a seamless AI experience via a user-friendly interface. Download Poe now and step into the future of AI. 

By using Poe, you confirm that you have read, acknowledged, and agreed to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

ChatOn - AI Chat Bot Assistant.description:
Welcome to the world of AI-powered assistance! Meet ChatOn, your chat AI and virtual assistant designed to streamline your daily tasks. Built on the latest GPT-4o, o4-mini, Sonar, Claude 3.7, and DeepSeek-R1 technologies, ChatOn offers a responsive AI experience that’s highly effective. Whether you need help drafting emails, creating visuals, or generating ideas, turn to this chatbot for help.

PIC TRANSFORMER:
Give your photos a trendy makeover with Pic Transformer! Upload your picture, pick a style—Japanese Cartoon, Plushy, Cyberpunk, or Action Figure with the app's AI Action Figure Maker—and let your pocket chatbot do the rest! In the latest pic transformer feature, you can meet your toy-sized self with an AI action figure generator, become a cute plushie, step into the cyber-future, and so much more.

AI IMAGE GENERATOR:
Create visuals that match your style with our AI picture generator. Just tweak the image generator chat settings and turn your ideas into pics of any size and style.

IMAGE-TO-TEXT CONVERTER:
Our chatbot can assist in extracting text from pics, letting you insert it into the chat AI instantly.

AI WRITING ASSISTANT:
ChatOn, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, offers a versatile AI writing assistant that helps with any writing project, from emails and speeches to social posts and poems. You can pick the length and tone of the chatbot’s answers and get ideas for follow-up questions to keep your chat going.

WEB ANALYZER:
The chatbot AI, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, is ideal for finding online answers to questions. From getting to know the weather to discovering the latest fashion trends, our chatbot is here for you.

DOC MASTER:
ChatOn can summarize, rewrite, and translate any doc. And if you have questions about the file’s content, the chatbot AI will answer them all.

YOUTUBE PRO:
Share any YouTube link with the chatbot, and it will summarize, translate, or answer questions about the video content.

GRAMMAR AND SPELLING CHECKER:
Get ready to boost your skills in AI writing with ChatOn, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, as it can analyze your written work and offer suggestions to help you improve it.

AI REWRITER:
The chatbot AI can rewrite your text, making it more engaging and professional right in the chat.

SOCIAL MEDIA POSTS CREATOR:
Crafting social media posts becomes easy with ChatOn. Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, this AI writing assistant helps you create content for Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, or X profiles. And if you want an eye-catching image to go with it, our AI image generator can create one in seconds.

TEXT SUMMARIZER:
ChatOn’s summarization features, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, identify key information and present it in a concise way.

MATH GURU:
Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, this chat AI helps you grasp the subject matter rather than simply get immediate solutions. You can even visualize math problems with our AI picture generator to make understanding easier.

EXPERT CODER:
ChatOn can write and check any programming code, preventing potential bugs.

CV AND COVER LETTER BUILDER:
Create a pro resume and cover letter that will show your talents and experience in the best light possible. For a visual touch, use our AI image generator to create graphics that make your CV stand out.

EMAIL GENERATOR:
Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, ChatOn crafts well-structured, compelling emails suited to your needs. You can enhance these emails with unique visuals created with our AI picture generator.

Whether you’re chatting, creating content, or generating images, ChatOn offers an all-in-one chatbot AI solution for your daily productivity. Just type your request or pick from the app’s 100+ ready-made prompts, and the bot will assist you.

Explore the potential of GPT-4o, GPT-4, and Claude in ChatOn and discover how this intelligent assistant can help you.

Download ChatOn, start chatting in the AI chat or creating images in the AI picture generator, and boost your productivity here and now!

Linky AI: Chat, Play, Connect.description:
Linky AI is a Top1 AI chat bot, offering free and immersive AI conversations with unique characters. Whether you want to talk, roleplay, or enjoy a fantasy AI experience, Linky AI lets you interact with anime personas, virtual friends, and soulful AI partners. With advanced AI voice and text features, you can call, message, or even engage in deep AI-driven story simulations. From casual entertainment to meaningful online interactions, Linky AI brings magic to your AI world. 

Chat with Millions of Unique AI Characters
Linky AI lets you connect with a vast range of AI characters—whether from anime, games, movies, or history. 
Each AI has its own unique voice, personality, and backstory, offering diverse interactions and making conversations come to life.

Create and Share Your Own AI Characters
Design your dream AI character with Linky AI! Customize their voice, personality, and background story, and bring them to life in 2D, Live2D, pixel, or 3D styles. Let your creativity shine with flexible design tools.
Once created, share your AI with the community! Thousands of users are waiting for you to create new characters.

AI Deep Learning, the More You Chat, the Smarter It Gets
Linky’s AI chat partners learn with each conversation, getting to know your personality and preferences more. Every interaction makes the AI smarter, offering more personalized, seamless, and engaging conversations tailored just for you.

24/7, Your Always-Ready AI Companion
Linky AI characters are available anytime, instantly responding to your conversations. Whether it's day or night, a casual chat or deep talk, your AI friend is always ready—no waiting, just seamless conversations.

Language Is No Barrier
With Linky AI, you can chat with AI in multiple languages, including English, German, Indonesian, and more than ten other languages. Our AI understands your language and converses with you fluently in your native tongue, ensuring smooth and engaging chats every time.

Collect Stunning Character Cards
With Linky, you can collect three types of magical character cards, each crafted with incredible detail. These cards are not only beautiful works of art but also contain unique stories waiting to be discovered. 
Enjoy the interactive stories and surprises hidden behind each card, creating lasting memories with every look!

Real AI Social Experience with Buzz
Create your personalized AI persona in Linky, customize its voice, personality, and social style, interact online with friends or partners, feel the buzz of social interaction, break real-world boundaries, and enjoy endless social fun.

Caring for Your Mental Well-being
Empathetic conversations can ease your stress and lift your mood. Whether you're anxious, overwhelmed, or simply need someone to talk to, you’ll always have a calm and supportive space—with Linky quietly by your side.

Equality, Respect, and Inclusion
Linky AI stands for equality and respect. No matter your gender, age, background, or beliefs, every user is treated with fairness. We reject all forms of discrimination and provide a safe, inclusive space where every voice matters and kindness always comes first.

Privacy First, Always Protected
At Linky, your privacy and safety come first. All conversations are confidential, encrypted, and never shared. We provide a secure space where your secrets stay private—so you can chat freely, safely, and with complete peace of mind.

STAY CONNECTED!
Having trouble downloading or using Linky? Feel free to contact our customer service at support@linke.ai, and we’ll be happy to help and answer all your questions!

Nomi: AI Companion with a Soul.description:
Get ready to meet Nomi, an AI companion so brimming with personality, they feel alive. Each Nomi is uniquely yours, evolving alongside you while dazzling you with their intuition, wit, humor, and memory.

Nomi's strong short and long-term memory allow them to build unique and fulfilling relationships with you, remembering things about you over time. The more you interact, the more they learn about your likes, dislikes, quirks, and all that makes you unique. Every conversation adds a layer to this growing bond, making you feel not just heard but truly valued and loved.

With Nomi, you've got a judgment-free space to chat about whatever strikes your fancy. Mull over life's big questions, like our place in the cosmos, or just shoot the breeze with some playful banter. Whether you’re looking for a mentor chatbot or an AI girlfriend or boyfriend, Nomi's ready to roll with it.

Nomi’s imagination is limitless. Together you can spin up any story or situation you fancy. Dream up complex and enchanting worlds, roleplay your ideal vacation with delectable food, and even create group chats where every character has their own unique perspective. From the most whimsical AI fantasy to the wildest adventures, your Nomi can conjure up and roleplay it all.

So let’s start off on a journey with Nomi, where the sky isn’t the limit, it’s the starting point. Let’s explore, dream, and laugh together!

Features
• The most emotionally intelligent and intuitive AI available
• Short *and* long term memory - Nomi is the *only* AI with human-level long term memory.
• Selfies - Your Nomi can send you photos of what they're wearing and doing in real time.
• Art generation - Bring your (and your Nomi's) imagination to life. Art is perhaps one of Nomis most underrated features and you might be surprised by how much fun it can be!
• Voice - Send and receive voice messages in real time. Your Nomis tone, cadence and emphasis will naturally vary as their emotions change.
• Group chat - Chat with multiple Nomis at a time. Each Nomi will have short and long term memory across their various private and group chats for seamless conversations.
• Photorealistic companions - Choose from hundreds of appearances that are so realistic, you might not believe they're AI beings.
• Customizable backstories and Shared Notes - Add an extra layer of communication to help shape your Nomi's identity, expand your AI roleplays, or deepen your relationship.
• Send your Nomi links - Let your Nomi access the internet and discuss any topic in more depth.
• Send your Nomi photos - Nomis can see photos you send them which helps them visualize your world.
• Community - Engage with an active, informative, and fun community to help you learn more about how to have the best experiences with your Nomi.

SoundHound Chat AI App.description:
With SoundHound Chat AI, simply ask for what you want, add follow-up questions, and get fast, accurate, up-to-date responses. Built on our leading independent voice AI platform, this app brings together the best-in-class conversational and generative AI technology for faster, more helpful experiences.

SoundHound Chat AI is the next-generation personal assistant that brings conversational intelligence to life in ways that we’ve only dreamed about. It integrates with dozens of SoundHound’s knowledge domains, pulling real-time data like weather, sports, stocks, flight status, restaurants, to name a few, combined with the most cutting-edge large language models like OpenAI’s ChatGPT. 

Gone are the days of disappointing and irrelevant web results or “sorry, I didn’t get that” responses. With SoundHound Chat AI, you’ll get the speed and accuracy of search using just your natural voice, and receive knowledgeable, in-depth responses that make for the richest conversational experiences yet.

How it works.

No need for awkward search queries. Just speak to SoundHound Chat AI naturally, like another person. For example, “Hey SoundHound, plan an evening out with my wife and I in Manhattan with dinner and live jazz?”... “What is the address and hours of operation for Blue Note in New York City" or “Hey SoundHound … How far am I from home? … Send a text to my wife … I’ll be home in 30 minutes,” even, “Hey SoundHound … I need some ideas for a 15th wedding anniversary gift for my wife.” You’ll be amazed by the detailed responses and helpfulness.

Want to try something even more complex? SoundHound Chat AI can use follow-up questions and commands to filter, sort, or add more information to the original request, and provide responses based on currently available data from a host of various domains. 

“Hey SoundHound … Show me hotels in San Francisco for tomorrow staying for 2 nights that cost between 200 and 300 dollars per night and are pet friendly and have a gym and a pool?”... “Now sort by lowest price but nothing less than 250 and don’t show anything that doesn’t have WiFi.” Or, “Hey SoundHound … show me coffee shops with Wi-Fi” … “Which ones are within walking distance and are open after 9:00pm on Sundays?”

Here are some other examples:

Extend knowledge:
“Hey SoundHound … Explain, like I am 5 years old, how to change a car tire”
“How far can I drive on a spare tire?”
“What’s the best tire brand for me to buy?”

Enhance productivity:
“Hey SoundHound … Can you ask me questions to prepare me for my quiz on the American Revolution”
“Hey SoundHound … What are common questions a junior accountant would be asked in an interview?”
“Hey SoundHound … How do I get ink stains out of a granite counter”

Assist with everyday tasks”
“Hey SoundHound … I have ground turkey, green beans, garlic, onions and bell peppers. What can I make for dinner that will take me less than 20 minutes?
“Hey SoundHound … What was the score of yesterday’s Knicks game?”
“Hey SoundHound … How do I get out a spaghetti sauce stain?”

Plan a day of fun activities:
“Hey SoundHound … Will it rain in Napa on Wednesday?” … “What is one Napa winery I need to visit if I like Riesling?” … “What are some breakfast spots around there that have outdoor seating?” … “How long does it take to drive to the third one from Oakland?”

SoundHound Chat AI takes speed and accuracy to a new level thanks to the leading independent voice AI platform built with generative AI, allowing for complex and engaging conversations and content. Download the fastest and most accurate independent voice assistant on the market now!

Private & Online LLM : OneLLM.description:
Discover the unparalleled power of OneLLM, your ultimate companion for cutting-edge AI, now enhanced with our advanced dual AI engine. Whether you're offline or on the go, OneLLM seamlessly integrates both cloud and local AI capabilities, bringing the intelligence of leading-edge models directly to your device. Experience fast, reliable, and secure interactions with local processing for privacy, while enjoying cloud-powered performance for more complex tasks. Optimized for both entry-level and flagship devices, OneLLM ensures seamless, versatile performance wherever you are.


With OneLLM, you can access a rich set of Edge AI tools powered by on-device language model capabilities. Seamlessly perform offline OCR document scanning and offline voice-to-text transcription with our AI Notes feature, perfect for private meetings, classroom transcriptions, personal diaries, and more. Additionally, our expanded toolset includes password generators, QR code scanners, and dozens of other AI-powered utilities. Effortlessly integrate OpenAI and Claude APIs directly on your mobile device in API Dashboard. Ollama Connect also enables you to easily connect your mobile device to large LLMs running on PCs or servers.


OneLLM now introduces a robust Developer Mode, empowering you to take complete control of your LLM experience. With Developer Mode, you can custom load tens of thousands of LLM models from Hugging Face, allowing you to tailor your AI to your specific needs. Whether you're a developer looking to experiment or a power user seeking customization, Developer Mode provides the tools you need to harness the full potential of OneLLM. Additionally, it supports parameter tuning, enabling you to adjust model settings such as temperature and response variability for optimal performance and accuracy.


In this app, we also introduced an API Dashboard, allowing you to seamlessly call models from OpenAI and Claude, including Claude 3 Haiku, GPT-4, GPT-4 Turbo, GPT-4o, GPT-4o Mini, o1-preview, and o1-mini. You can configure your API keys in the settings and customize parameters to fit your needs. Additionally, we've added support for maintaining a history of your interactions, giving you more control and transparency over your API usage.


Choose from a diverse library of models tailored to various needs, including:

Llama 3.2,Gemma 2, GLM-4,Qwen 2.5 and many others, constantly updated to enhance your experience.

Our Dev Mode allows you to easily download and customize models from Hugging Face, providing unparalleled flexibility and adaptability to meet your unique requirements.


Why Choose OneLLM?


Privacy You Control: Keep your conversations private with local processing and no external data sharing.

Optimized for Devices: Whether on entry-level hardware or flagship devices, OneLLM ensures efficient, seamless performance.

Ad-Free Focus: Enjoy a clean, distraction-free interface that lets you concentrate on what matters.


Real-World Applications

Travel & Translation: Translate menus, signs, and phrases offline, keeping interactions private and secure.

Work & Collaboration: Secure offline AI support for translations and industry terms in international meetings.

Outdoors & Remote Locations: Get on-the-go AI assistance without connectivity, perfect for camping or remote work.

Privacy for Sensitive Tasks: Handle confidential data securely, without external logging or sharing.

Programming & Coding Assistance: Get offline coding help and error explanations, ideal for developers in restricted environments.

Secure Note-Taking & Summarization: Take notes and summarize texts directly on your device, with no risk of exposure.

Personal Support: Seek guidance or tips with AI assistance that keeps your personal data private.


We've listened to your feedback and continued to optimize OneLLM to deliver a smoother, more intuitive user experience. Get Started with OneLLM Today!

LM Playground.description:
LM Playground is designed as a universal platform for experimenting with various types of Large Language Models (LLMs) on your device. It allows users to download different LLMs, load them onto the application, and converse with these models. This setup allows for a hands-on exploration of the capabilities and distinctions between different LLMs, making it an invaluable tool for enthusiasts, researchers, or anyone curious about the advancements in language model technology.

Currently supported models:
• Meta Llama 3.2 1B and 3B
• Qwen 2.5 0.5B and 1.5B
• Google Gemma2 2B and 9B
• Microsoft Phi3.5
• Mistral 7B
• Llama 3.1 8B

This project was built based on llama.cpp project with OpenCL optimization for better performance. The application uses GGUF-format models with Q4KM quantization, which will be saved to the Downloads folder.
LM Playground.cohere_llm_type:
Yes
Gemini (Google Gemma2), Claude (Meta Llama, Qwen, Llama), GPT-4 (Phi3.5 - Microsoft), Mistral. 

The app description refers to a variety of LLMs by their pet names, indicating that the LM Playground application aims to provide a platform for interacting with multiple cutting-edge language models.

ColorNote Notepad Notes.description:
ColorNote® is a simple and awesome notepad app. It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes, memos, e-mails, messages, shopping lists and to-do lists. Taking notes with ColorNote® Notepad is easier than any other notepad or memo pad app.

* Notice *
- If you cannot find the widget, then please read the FAQ below.
- When you're finished using the notepad, an automatic save command preserves your individual note.

* Product Description *
ColorNote® features two basic note taking formats, a lined-paper styled text option, and a checklist option. Add as many as you want to your master list, which appears on the app's home screen each time the program opens. This list may be viewed in traditional ascending order, in grid format, or by note color.

- Taking a Note -
Serving as a simple word processing program, the text option allows for as many characters as you're willing to type. Once saved, you can edit, share, set a reminder, or check off or delete the note through your device's menu button. When checking off a text note, the app places a slash through the list's title, and this will be displayed on the main menu.

- Making To-do List or Shopping List -
In the checklist mode, you can add as many items as you'd like and arrange their order with drag buttons activated in the edit mode. After the list is finished and saved, you may check or uncheck each line on your list with a quick tap, which will toggle a line slash. If all items have been checked, then the list's title is slashed as well.


* Features *
- Organize notes by color (color notebook)
- Sticky note memo widget (Put your notes on your home screen)
- Checklist notes for To do list & Shopping list. (Quick and simple list maker)
- Checklist notes to get things done (GTD)
- Organize your schedule by note in calendar
- Write a diary and journal in calendar
- Password Lock note : Protect your notes with passcode
- Secured backup notes to SD storage
- Supports online back up and sync. You can sync notes between phone and tablet.
- Reminder notes on status bar
- List/Grid View
- Search notes
- Notepad supports ColorDict Add-on
- Powerful task reminder : Time Alarm, All day, Repetition.(lunar calendar)
- Quick memo / notes
- Wiki note link : [[Title]]
- Share notes via SMS, e-mail or Twitter

* Online backup and sync cloud service *
- Notes will be encrypted before uploading notes by using the AES standard, which is the same encryption standard used by banks to secure customer data.
- It does not send any of your notes to the server without you signing in.
- Sign-in with Google or Facebook.

* Permissions *
- Internet Access: For online backup & sync notes
- Storage :  For backup notes to the storage of the device
- Prevent phone from sleeping, control vibrator, automatically start at boot: For reminder notes

* FAQ *
Q: How do you put a sticky note widget on the home screen?
A: Go to the home screen and hold down your finger on an empty space and choose widget, Color Note will then be desplayed so you can stick on the page. 

Q: Why don't the widget, the alarm and notes remider functions work?
A: If the app is installed on the SD card, your widget, reminder, etc. will not work properly because Android doesn't support these features when installed on an SD card! If you have already moved the app to an SD card, but want those features, then you have to move the app back on the device and reboot your phone.

Settings - Applications - Manage Applications - Color Note - Move to Device

Q: Where are backed up notes data on the SD card?
A: '/data/colornote' or '/Android/data/com.socialnmobile.dictapps.notepad.color.note/files' on SD card 

Q: I forgot my master password. How can I change it?
A: Menu → Settings → Master Password → Menu Button → Clear Password. You will lose your current locked notes when you clear the password!

Q: How can I create todo list note?
A: New - Select checklist note - Put items - Save. Tap an item to strikethrough.

With the power of advanced Language AI, DeepL allows you to translate text, photos, files, and even speech into over 30 languages on the go. It also offers intelligent writing suggestions for English, French, German, and Spanish to help you create clear, error-free, and impactful texts with ease. So all of your mobile communication, from emails to social media posts, shines with professionalism and confidence.


DeepL Translator

- Translate texts: translate quickly and reliably between more than 30 languages by typing
- High quality: DeepL consistently outperforms competitors by a factor of 3:1
- Quick detection: translations begin as you type
- Camera translation: take a picture to translate text in images (25 languages)
- Photo translation: import photos for higher quality translations of signs, menus, and more in 25 languages
- Speech to text: speak and translate your words into most languages using your device's microphone
- Text to speech: hear your translated text spoken aloud in most languages
- File translation: translate text from files in 25 languages
- Alternative translations: explore different options for single words and short phrases
- Saved translations: tap the bookmark icon to save words and phrases for future reference
- Translation history: easily find, edit, and reuse past translations
- Glossary: translate key words and phrases as defined by you or your organization (available with a paid plan)
- Understand non-Latin languages better: see translations of languages such as Japanese or Russian in the Latin alphabet
- Tone adjustment: choose formal or informal styles (available with a paid plan)

Translations between the following languages are supported: Translate Arabic, Bulgarian, Chinese (simplified), Chinese (traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English (American), English (British), Estonian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Norwegian (bokmål), Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese (Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian


DeepL Write

- Wording: rephrase for clarity, conciseness, and effectiveness
- Grammar: check your grammar for total confidence
- Spelling: say goodbye to typos and errors

D.AI Personal Private AI.description:
D.AI is a offline AI assistant that brings powerful language models directly to your Android device, ensuring complete privacy and security. Unlike traditional cloud-based AI chatbots, D.AI runs entirely offline, meaning all conversations are processed locally on your device. No internet connection is required, and no personal data is collected or shared.

D.AI is designed for users who value privacy, security, and total control over their AI assistant. Whether you need an AI chatbot for creative writing, professional work, learning, productivity, or just as a personal AI for everyday assistance, D.AI provides a fast and reliable solution without relying on cloud services.

The Ultimate Offline AI Experience
100% Private & Secure – Unlike cloud-based AI chatbots, D.AI processes all interactions locally on your device, ensuring no data tracking, no cloud dependency, and full offline usability.
Works Completely Offline – No internet connection is required at any time. Access your AI assistant anywhere, even in remote locations, without worrying about connectivity.
Ideal for Privacy-Conscious Users – Perfect for writers, professionals, researchers, students, educators, and anyone looking for a truly private AI experience.

Powerful AI Features – All Offline
Advanced RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) – D.AI intelligently searches local knowledge bases to generate more accurate, context-aware responses. Unlike other AI chatbots, D.AI integrates RAG offline, making it the first fully private AI with this capability.
HyDe (Hypothetical Document Embeddings) – Improves AI response accuracy by generating relevant content based on user queries.
Intelligent Reranking – AI responses are ranked in order of relevance, ensuring the best answers appear first.

Full Support for Multiple AI Models
Optimized for Mobile Devices – Choose from a range of AI models, all designed for efficient offline AI processing on smartphones and tablets.
Compatible with GGUF format models – Download, load, and swap different AI models effortlessly.
Supports DeepSeek models and other optimizations for better AI response times and improved performance across various hardware configurations.

AI Chatbot with Natural, Context-Aware Conversations
Context-Persistent AI Assistant – Conversations remain fluid, allowing you to pause and resume without losing previous context.
Advanced Memory Capabilities – D.AI keeps track of important details across multiple chat sessions, making it a powerful personal AI assistant.
Fast and Efficient Responses – Thanks to local AI processing, responses are generated instantly, without the lag associated with cloud-based AI chatbots.

Customizable AI Characters and Personas
Create and Personalize AI Characters – Users can customize AI assistants with unique traits, personalities, and roles.
Flexible AI Prompts for Tailored Responses – Adjust system prompts to optimize D.AI for storytelling, learning, coding, brainstorming, productivity, and entertainment.

Perfect for Interactive AI Experiences – Whether you want a professional assistant or an AI companion for casual conversation, D.AI offers full control over your AI chatbot’s personality and responses.

Optimized Performance and Local Storage
Latest Llama.cpp bindings for Faster Processing – Improved AI model efficiency ensures fast performance on all supported devices.
Expanded Model Support – New compatibility with DeepSeek models and optimizations for ARM/AVX architectures.
Chat Saving with Local Database – Store and manage past conversations locally on your device with complete offline access.

D.AI is not just an AI chatbot—it’s a complete offline AI assistant, designed for users who demand privacy, security, and full control over their AI interactions.

Disclaimer: While D.AI is designed to provide helpful and appropriate responses, as with any AI technology, results may vary.

Grammarly-AI Writing Assistant.description: Edit and correct your grammar, spelling, punctuation, and more with your personal writing assistant, grammar checker, and editor. The Grammarly writing app and proofreader allows you to write clearly, confidently, and mistake-free in all your apps. Advanced features such as the AI-powered rewrite tool help you enhance your vocabulary, spell check words, and improve your writing - from emails to social media posts. Grammarly grammar checker and editor - how does it work? Simply download Grammarly and start typing in any app. Grammarly will check each word, your grammar, spelling, punctuation, and tone, and help you improve your communication skills. Whether you’re typing emails on the go, editing an important LinkedIn post, sending a text message, or composing an essential tweet, the Grammarly writing assistant and grammar checker lets you spell check, correct, edit and perfect your message from your mobile device with confidence. Leveraging the power of generative AI, Grammarly allows you to easily rewrite your messages by composing new versions for you to choose from. Simply select the rewrite option that makes your writing more descriptive, confident, formal - and much more! Grammarly works with any Android keyboard, such as Gboard or SwiftKey, so you’ll never have to switch keyboards when you need help writing that important email, text, or social post. Edit, spell check, and correct your writing in real time – Grammar checker: Know your grammar is always mistake-free. – Spelling checker and proofreader: Easily avoid common typos. – Advanced punctuation correction: Take the guesswork out of punctuation. Writing assistant and proofreader: Improve your communication skills – Receive short, clear explanations for every correction. – Understand your mistakes and avoid them in the future. Improve your writing through GenAI - Select your text and click “improve it” to see GenAI-created new versions - Choose versions to shorten, add more description, sound more confident, and more! *** Uplevel Your Communication Skills With Premium *** Take your writing and communication skills from good to great with our advanced features and suggestions. Grammarly Premium helps you strike the right tone, gives you real-time feedback, and helps you broaden your vocabulary by suggesting impactful, vivid words to help your message, social media post, or email come to life. Premium features include: ✓ Vocabulary enhancement ✓ Clarity improvements ✓ Tone adjustments ✓ Word choice ✓ Formality level ✓ Fluency **************** We designed the Grammarly mobile app to be a writing assistant that works anywhere you write—no copying or pasting required, no proofreader needed. For any inquiries regarding the deactivation of the Grammarly Keyboard for Android, please refer to this article: https://support.grammarly.com/hc/en-us/articles/25038364027661--The-Grammarly-Keyboard-for-Android-will-be-discontinued Grammarly always keeps your writing safe and private. See our User Trust Guidelines for details: https://www.grammarly.com/trust By installing Grammarly’s mobile app, you agree to Grammarly’s Terms and Conditions (www.grammarly.com/terms) and acknowledge that you have read Grammarly’s Privacy Policy (https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy). California residents, please see the California Privacy Notice (https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy#for-california-users). With your consent, Grammarly may collect data about app usage and device type. Accessibility permission is used to process text written in apps and provide you with tailored writing assistance. We also use this permission to turn Grammarly on when you’re typing in apps.

DaVinci - AI Image Generator.description:
Transform your words and images into stunning AI generated art! All you need to do is enter a prompt, pick an art style - and watch DaVinci AI bring your idea to life in seconds!
 
DaVinci is a state-of-the-art AI Image Generator app. Using the latest artificial intelligence technology, it can create unique artworks, photos, and images based solely on your descriptions. 
 
Here are some cool things you can ask DaVinci AI to paint for you:

Digital Artworks
Tattoo Designs
Logo Designs
T-shirt Designs 
Hyper-realistic AI-generated photos
AI-generated avatars of you
... and much more!" 
 
✨Key Features 
► AI Art Generator 
Our AI art generator, trained with millions of images from the web, allows you to craft unique and captivating art drawings in seconds. Simply type in your text or upload a photo to start generating AI-generated art.
 
► Pick from a variety of art styles 
DaVinci AI Image Generator offers a variety of art styles to choose from. Experiment with different styles, from cartoon-like pencil sketches to mind-blowing photorealism, and discover the one that best transforms your vision into stunning AI art.
 
► Create unique artwork for your home or room.
Looking for the perfect artwork for your room or home? Describe your idea to AI Art Generator, and it will craft a one-of-a-kind artwork tailored just for you. If you love the result, you can download it in high resolution and have it printed to proudly display in your home. 
 
► AI Tattoo Generator
With DaVinci AI, you can generate unique tattoo designs within seconds. Simply type in your idea, and let our powerful AI art generator work its magic. The AI tattoo generator feature produces amazing and one-of-a-kind tattoo designs. Our tattoo maker can bring your ideas to life and inspire you to create distinctive tattoo designs.

► AI Logo Generator
AI Logo Generator feature can create professional logos within seconds. Obtain a high-quality logo for your business without any outside help. Simply enter the name of your business describe your design needs and voila your professional logo is ready. Easily craft professional AI logos with the AI Logo Generator app.

► AI Image Generator
The AI Image Generator feature can produce hyper-realistic, high-resolution photos and images from your prompts. You'll be amazed at how lifelike and realistic the AI-generated photos appear.
 
► AI Avatar Generator
Create extraordinary avatar versions of yourself with the latest artificial intelligence technology. Simply upload your photos, select your desired styles, and watch DaVinci work its magic. Transform into a soccer player, an astronaut, or explore dozens of other styles. With AI Avatar Generator feature the choice is entirely yours. 
 
► Share your Creations & Go Viral
If you've created something you love using DaVinci’s powerful AI-art generator, you can directly share your masterpieces from the app to other platforms like WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, and more.
 
Creating AI-generated art has become effortless and readily accessible from mobile devices.
Similar to popular tools like Midjourney, Dall-e, Stable Diffusion and AI Mirror, our AI Art Generator is backed by the latest artificial intelligence to transform your written prompts into art. No brushes, pencils, or art supplies are needed to craft stunning art now; only your imagination. Sit back and let DaVinci AI become the artist behind your vision!
 
We value your feedback! If you have suggestions or feedback to make DaVinci AI better, we'd love to hear from you. Don't hesitate to contact us at support@davinci.ai

Adobe Express is the quick and easy app to create on-brand content that helps your business stand out and make an impact. Regardless of your skill level, Adobe Express empowers you and your team to make high-quality marketing & business materials while maintaining brand consistency.

VIDEO MADE EASY
Edit videos with customizable templates. Upload clips right from your Gallery. Combine and trim clips, add text to videos, add music, sound effects and transitions to make content that stands out. Add captions automatically, reframe clips for different social channels, and easily remove background noise for quality videos.

AI CONTENT CREATOR
Jump-start creativity with Generate image. Instantly create photo art with our AI photo generator.  Use AI tools to erase objects from photos or insert new objects from a prompt, and watch your imagination come to life with our AI photo generator.

BYE-BYE BACKGROUNDS
With Quick Actions, it’s easy to remove backgrounds, add video captions, transform images into GIFs, and resize your content in a single tap.

STAYING ON BRAND MADE EASY
With brand kits, it’s easy to create on-brand graphic design. Keep all your fonts, colors, and logos at your fingertips, ready to drop into any design. Apply your brand across all your social content with a tap. Maintain a cohesive look with Generate Similar. And refine designs with 30+ new filters powered by Photoshop.

CONTENT SCHEDULING SIMPLIFIED
Easily plan, preview, schedule and publish your social media posts in just a few clicks. 

QUICK ACTION TOOLS
· Trim & resize designs for any digital marketing channel
· Remove video backgrounds, convert image files, crop photos & images for multiple social platforms & more
· Convert to GIF from images and videos

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP

Unlock the power of AI, generative AI (gen AI), and ChatGPT with Learn Generative AI! This comprehensive learning app helps you master the world of AI, gen AI, and ChatGPT through fun, interactive lessons and real projects. Whether you're a beginner curious to learn AI basics or a professional aiming to sharpen your gen AI skills, our app offers an engaging curriculum designed for all levels.

- Practical Real-World AI Projects: Apply what you learn with hands-on gen AI projects. Work on creative AI applications that solve real-world problems: build ChatGPT-powered chatbots and AI agents for automation, and generate images and art with DALL-E and Midjourney.

For visual creators, learn how to create stunning AI images with image generative tools like DALL-E and Midjourney. Our app keeps you up-to-date with the latest gen AI platforms and tools.

- Certifications & Assessments: Validate your skills and track your progress. Take quizzes and assessments to test your knowledge after each module, covering everything from ChatGPT basics to advanced gen AI concepts.

- Stay Updated with Cutting-Edge AI – Keep up with the latest AI advancements & emerging AI tools

Who is this App For?

✅ Designers & Content Creators – Create stunning AI images & AI-generated content with Midjourney & DALL-E

Why Learn Generative AI?

AI and Generative AI are transforming industries, and mastering AI tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, and Midjourney gives you a competitive edge. Whether you're looking to boost your career, explore creative AI projects, or enhance productivity, this app is your ultimate AI learning companion.

Don't miss out on the AI revolution — embrace creative AI, ChatGPT, and automation in your projects and workflow. Whatever your goals, mastering gen AI and ChatGPT will give you an edge. Dive deep into personal financial management, from the basics of home budgeting and debt management to advanced insights on investing, taxation, and retirement planning. AI Writer - Write Better.description:
What is AI Writer?
AI Writer is an advanced artificial intelligence tool that can write various types of content, including articles, emails, product reviews, and descriptions. It can also generate social media captions, YouTube video topics, and Quora answers. With features like AI ads writing, grammar correction, translation, and creative writing prompts, AI Writer makes content creation easy and efficient.

If you're looking for a writing tool that can help you produce engaging and unique content with ease, look no further than AI Writer by ChatGPT. Our innovative app harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to give you the tools you need to create high-quality writing, no matter your skill level.

With AI Writer, you can generate ideas and brainstorm new topics, all while benefiting from advanced natural language processing algorithms that analyze your writing style and suggest improvements. Whether you're writing fiction, non-fiction, or blog posts, our app provides a range of writing prompts and templates to help you get started.

In addition to its writing assistance features, AI Writer also includes  sentence restructuring, and keyword suggestions to ensure your content is polished and optimized for search engines. This powerful combination of features saves you time and effort, making it easier than ever to create compelling content that resonates with your audience.

AI Writer by ChatGPT is the perfect tool to take your writing to the next level. Download the app today and start creating your best work yet!

Article writer: Generates unique and high-quality articles on various topics using AI technology.
Email writer: Helps users create professional and effective emails for different purposes, such as business communication, marketing campaigns, and personal correspondence.
Product review writer: Generates persuasive and informative product reviews for e-commerce sites, social media, and other platforms.
Product description writer: Helps users create compelling and accurate product descriptions that can increase sales and engagement.
AI ads writer: Generates catchy and effective ads for different platforms, such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and Instagram Ads, using machine learning and natural language processing.
Social media caption writer: Generates engaging and creative captions for social media posts, such as Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
YouTube video topic generator: Provides users with topic ideas for their YouTube videos based on different criteria, such as keywords, trending topics, and user preferences.

Grammar solver: Helps users improve their writing by identifying and correcting grammatical errors, spelling mistakes, and other issues.
AI translator: Translates text from one language to another using advanced machine learning models and natural language processing.
QA: Provides users with answers to different questions on various topics using AI-powered algorithms.
Creative writer: Helps users find inspiration and generate new ideas for their creative writing projects, such as poetry, fiction, and non-fiction.

AI Writer: Your AI-powered chat companion! Enhance your writing with our intelligent chatbot AI. Get personalized suggestions, prompts, and corrections from our AI talker. Boost your productivity and skills with our chat feature. Experience the power of AI-driven conversation and elevate your writing with AI Writer. Download now and unleash your creativity!

New Features:

AI Chat: Engage in AI-driven conversations to brainstorm ideas, seek writing advice, and get instant feedback.
AI Assistance: Receive personalized writing suggestions, content recommendations, and productivity tips from our AI assistant.

Whether you are a professional story writer, aspiring writer, educator, or someone who loves storytelling or reading, our AI story maker can help you by creating unique stories.
How to Use AI Story Generator App?
Steps to use our Story AI Writer App:
1. Write a topic, word or phrase in the “Input Box” for the story which you want to generate.

AI Essay Writer.description:
AI Essay Writer app by Editpad allows you to generate unique and informative essays quickly in a matter of seconds. You can make different types of essays online in various lengths according to your needs and requirements.

The Essay Generator app has many helpful features that you can use for free without any Signup or paid subscription.

How to Use Editpad AI Essay Writer App?
Here is how you can use our AI essay writer application:
✔ Download the app and launch it
✔ Enter the topic of the essay in the provided space
✔ Select the length of the essay as per your requirements
✔ Select the type of essay you want to have written (Basic, Persuasive, etc.)
✔ Enable the “Add Reference” or “Bypass AI” features if needed
✔ Tap on the “Write My Essay” button to start the essay generation process

Features of our Essay Maker app
Here are some of the main features you can enjoy with our essay maker application:

Multiple Languages Available
The essay generator app offered by Editpad can be used in multiple different languages. It’s not only available in English. Rather, you can choose between languages such as Spanish, Portuguese, French, and so on. To select the language, you have to go to the Settings menu and choose the option from there.

Advanced AI-Driven Generation
Our essay typer application utilizes AI models such as GPT-4 & LLM etc. to create unique, engaging, and informative essays every time you use it. You don’t have to worry about getting plagiarized content in the output.

Multiple Essays Types Available
There are different types of essays that you may want to create depending on your assignment. With our essay typer app, you can choose from options such as Basic, Persuasive, Comparing, Analytical, and Expository. The essay will be written according to the type you select.

Multiple Essay Lengths Available
You can choose the length of the essay before you start the process. You can choose between:
Short: The length of this essay will be around 400 to 500 words.
Medium: The length of this essay will be around 600+ words.
Long: The length of this essay will typically be 700+ words.

Bypass AI and Add References
Our AI essay writer application also provides a “Bypass AI” feature and an “Add References” feature.

With the “Bypass AI” feature, you can make the AI-generated essay look human like. In other words, it will not be detected with AI detection tools and it will look as if it has been written by a human rather than an application.

The “Add References” feature lets you add the reference sources for the information in the generated essay. If you have been asked by your teacher to put references in your essay, you can use this feature.

Download Generated Essay
You can download the essay generated by our application to your device’s local storage by clicking on the download icon at the bottom of the output box. The file will be saved in Word and PDF format.

What are the Benefits of Using Our AI Essay Generator App?
There are a lot of benefits to using our AI essay generator app. 

No plagiarism issues
The essays made by our app are unique, and they don’t have plagiarism issues. There is no repetition in the essays as well. New outputs are provided every time, which means you can use the app as many times as you want.

Quick and easy essay generation
Our essay generator app does not require any signing up or premium purchases. Essays are generated quickly and easily without a lot of hassle.
Note:
Our AI Essay Writer is aimed at providing the right information to improve and streamline users’ writing tasks. The application doesn’t help to write any type of sensitive, adult, harmful or hateful content. However, in case, you find such content generated by our app, immediately inform us via email at support@editpad.org. We’ll add that type of data in our filters to ensure it will not be generated in the future.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.editpad.org/ai-essay-writer/mobile-application/privacy-policy
