Leveraging ChatGPT API, AI Story allows you to craft personalized stories based on your ideas about plots, characters, and genres, making storytelling more accessible and enjoyable than ever before.

WHO CAN BENEFIT FROM AI STORY AND HOW?
1. Aspiring Writers and Authors
 - Overcome Writer's Block: AI Story helps you break through creative barriers by providing fresh perspectives and ideas.
 - Experiment with New Genres and Styles: Discover and explore different writing styles and genres without the steep learning curve.
 - Enhance Story Depth and Complexity: Add layers and dimensions to your narratives, making them more engaging and profound.

2. Content Writers and Marketers
 - Save Time on Content Creation: Quickly generate blog posts, podcast scripts, and social media content without compromising quality.
 - Attract Customers with Unique Content: Stand out in a crowded market by delivering creative and compelling narratives.

3. Teachers and Educators
 - Create Engaging Educational Stories: Turn lessons into captivating stories that stimulate students' interest and imagination.
 - Develop Interactive Teaching Scripts: Design interactive scenarios that make learning dynamic and participatory.

4. Screenwriters and Film Producers
 - Generate Plot Ideas and Character Development: Explore new concepts for films or TV shows with AI-generated suggestions.
 - Experiment with Dramatic Scenarios: Create unique dialogues and situations that enhance the storytelling experience.

KEY FEATURES OF AI STORY
1. AI-Powered Creativity:
 - Innovative Story Suggestions: AI Story harnesses vast datasets to suggest themes, scenarios, and plots that are fresh and intriguing.
 - Randomized Plot Generation: Stimulate your creativity with unexpected plot twists and dramatic situations.

2. Diverse Genres and Writing Styles:
 - Seamless Genre Switching: Effortlessly move between genres like adventure, romance, science fiction, and more.
 - Customizable Writing Styles: Tailor the tone and style of your story to match your vision.

3. User-Centric Customization:
 - Personalized Input: Input your ideas, keywords, character descriptions, and settings to guide the story creation.
 - Flexible Story Length and Genre Selection: Choose the length and genre that best suit your needs.

HOW TO USE AI STORY?
1. Normal Mode
 - Begin by typing in your story idea or keywords that describe the narrative you envision.
 - Select the desired length for your story
 - (Optional) Provide more information about characters, settings, and genres to make the generated story align closely with your expectations.
 - Initiate the story creation process with a simple click "Start generate".
 - Once the AI has crafted your story, you can copy it or share it directly on social media, messaging apps, and more.

2. Step-by-Step Mode
 - Kick off your narrative without selecting a specific length, allowing for an open-ended creation process.
 - AI Story will produce the story in consecutive short segments, building upon each previous part.
 - After each generated segment, you have the opportunity to tweak characters, plot points, or introduce new ideas.
 - Repeat the process to expand your story as much as you like, exploring different directions and possibilities.

AI Story is a powerful tool that turns your ideas into vivid stories, catering to a wide range of creative needs. Whether you're an aspiring writer seeking inspiration, a teacher aiming to engage students, a marketer crafting compelling content, or a screenwriter exploring new plots, AI Story has something valuable to offer.

Don't let your ideas stay hidden! Download AI Story Generator AI Writer now to unlock endless creative possibilities and share your unique stories with the world.

Voice Access.description: Voice Access helps anyone who has difficulty manipulating a touch screen (e.g. due to paralysis, tremor, or temporary injury) use their Android device by voice. Voice Access provides many voice commands for: - Basic navigation (e.g. "go back", "go home", "open Gmail") - Controlling the current screen (e.g. "tap next", "scroll down") - Text editing and dictation (e.g. "type hello", "replace coffee with tea") You can also say "Help" any time to see a short list of commands. Voice Access includes a tutorial which introduces the most common voice commands (starting Voice Access, tapping, scrolling, basic text editing, and getting help). You can use the Google Assistant to start Voice Access by saying "Hey Google, Voice Access". To do this, you’ll need to enable "Hey Google" detection. You can also tap either the Voice Access notification or a blue Voice Access button and start talking. To pause Voice Access temporarily, just say "stop listening". To disable Voice Access completely, go to Settings > Accessibility > Voice Access and turn off the switch. For additional support, see Voice Access help. This app uses the AccessibilityService API to help users with motor impairments. It uses the API to collect information about the controls on the screen and activate them based on the user’s spoken instructions.

Google Assistant Go.description:
Lightweight and fast, yet still packed with your favorite features, the Google Assistant is now available on Android (Go edition).

Use your voice to get directions to the nearest coffee shop, make calls hands free during your commute, and unwind by playing your favorite tunes. You personal Google is here to help. Ask your Google Assistant questions and get things done. Use it anytime, anywhere.

With the Google Assistant Go, you can:

• Make quick phone calls on the go (“Call Sameer”)
• Send text messages (“Text Sara I am running late”)
• Play music (“Play some jazz on YouTube”)
• Navigate places (“Get me directions to the nearest coffee shop”)
• Preview your upcoming events (“Tell me about my day”)
• Weather information (“Do I need an umbrella today?”)
• Answers (“How tall is Mount Everest?”)


* You can quickly access the Google Assistant for Android (Go edition) by tapping on the Assistant app icon or long-pressing the home button on your phone running Android (Go edition).

* Certain features available on the Google Assistant for standard Android phones are currently not supported on the Google Assistant for Android (Go edition), such as reminders, controls for smart home devices, Actions on Google, and Device Actions.

* The Google Assistant for Android (Go edition) currently supports English.

Jarvis - AI Chatbot.description:
Unlock the power of Jarvis, your AI chatbot and personal assistant developed on OpenAI. Jarvis is a versatile productivity tool designed to assist you with tasks, learning, and research. With cutting-edge natural language processing, Jarvis offers engaging conversations, text completion, creative writing, and more.

Discover the potential of Jarvis, your personal AI assistant, built with the latest OpenAI technology:

- Meet the Personalities: Jarvis isn't just a chatbot anymore. Delve into a richer, more tailored experience with 12 Unique Personalities! Whether you're yearning for scholarly insights from the Professor, crafting a ballad with the Musician, exploring ancient tales with the Historian, or seeking wellness guidance from the Therapist – there's a Jarvis for every mood and mission.
- Continue Where You Left Off: Ever had a conversation you wished you could pick up from where you left? With our Saved Chat feature, you now can! Dive back into your past discussions effortlessly.
- Use conversational AI and natural language processing to code anything based on simple descriptions.
- Leverage Jarvis's creative writing skills to generate unique content for any occasion, from asking for a raise to crafting thank-you notes.
- Get personalized, healthy recipes based on your dietary restrictions, ingredient availability, and caloric goals with Jarvis's AI capabilities.
- Ask general knowledge questions and receive accurate answers from Jarvis's AI-powered knowledge base.
- Craft the perfect social media post with catchy captions for tweets and Instagram posts using Jarvis's AI assistance.
- Explore the unlimited potential of Jarvis as it uses the official developer API to provide the best answers to any question.

Please note that while Jarvis is highly accurate, some answers may not be entirely accurate or complete. We cannot be held responsible for inaccuracies, and you can cancel your subscription at any time. Exercise caution when interacting with Jarvis and refrain from providing personal information. Due to the nature of AI-generated content, there may be instances of offensive or harmful material. The Jarvis team cannot be held liable for any content generated by the chatbot. Use it at your discretion.

Upgrade to Jarvis Pro for even more capabilities.

Jarvis Pro offers 2 auto-renewing subscriptions:
Weekly Subscription ($4.99 USD/week)
Monthly Subscription ($17.99 USD/month)

Upon confirming your purchase, your Apple ID account will be charged for the cost of the subscription.
To avoid automatic renewal of your subscription, cancel it at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
Be aware that 24 hours before the end of the current period, your account will be charged for the cost of the renewal and the cost will be clearly identified.
You have the option to manage and cancel your subscriptions by accessing your account settings on the App Store after making the purchase.
If a free trial period is offered, any unused portion will be forfeited once a subscription is purchased.

Terms and Conditions:  https://finallyfreeproductions.com/terms_of_use-jarvis/ 
Privacy Policy:  https://finallyfreeproductions.com/privacy-policy-jarvis  


At Jarvis, we value your feedback and suggestions. We'd love to hear your thoughts and may incorporate them into the app. Reach out to us at aijarvisapp@gmail.com with questions or ideas.

We’re Lumica. We spend 99% of our time imagining what it would be like to step into our favorite characters shoes… and we know you do too. We’re not another generic AI avatar maker app - we’re bringing you carefully curated, beautiful avatar effects made for fans, by fans.

Step 3: Voila! See yourself like never before. 🤩 Export, rinse, repeat.

Did we mention we’re free?!

🎥  Film Fan Faves  🎥 
Of course, we’ve got all your TV and movie faves. Ever wondered what you’d look like as an elf? A wizard? A superhero? A hairy dude with an anger problem and really sharp nails? 😉 🐺 
Look no further. Become the hero, with Lumica.

🎃 Halloween 🎃 
Yeah it’s September but let’s face it - Halloween is here. Don’t blow your budget on a new halloween costume, use Lumica AI to try out every look before you whip out the cosplay supplies. Ever wonder what you’d look like as a famous goth? A superhero villain? If you joined a famous ghost bustin’ team? 👻 Wonder no more.

🧙 Are you sure you’re a tiefling though? 🧙‍♂️ 
Are you starting a new DnD campaign - and you really need to convince that last player that YEAH ACTUALLY your bard is very very obviously a tiefling - thanks!? Ok, we got quite specific here, some of our effects might come from personal vendettas but… we are sure you’re gonna love them too 😜 

…On a serious note; changing your Discord profile pic to an awesome druid version of yourself while you discuss your next DnD meet up is a flex, and we’re here to help you make that flex. You might wanna update your Twitch & Reddit pfp after that too…

😍 The Crowd Pleasers ❤️‍🔥 
Once you’ve made your first 50 avatars for yourself… you might want to move onto your friends, folks etc - share the avatar maker love. So don’t worry, we’ve got you covered. With state of the art claymation, barbie and extremely popular cartoon faves, all at your fingertips.

🎋 Cute Anime Looks 💕 
Find all your anime character faves here and also enjoy a host of gorgeous comic, cartoon and anime effects - beach vibes, classic anime movie vibes, fairground vibes, cyberpunk vibes - your anime vibe is here, we swear.

…And there’s just so, so much more to explore. We’ll shut up and let you download our app now 😄 


Talk to us! 
Lumica is an avatar app created by fans, for fans - and we’re different to other AI Avatar apps - we’re about quality not quantity 😉 
Email us at explore@piccollage.com with thoughts, content and feature requests and more - we’re all ears!

AI Picasso - Dream Art Studio.description:
Powerful AI for Video Generation
Animate your favorite photos into videos with the most powerful video-generating AI! This app leverages cutting-edge video generation AI to enable the creation of a variety of videos. With the AI Video feature, uploading just one image can bring to life the people or characters in that image, making them dance. It's also possible to train the AI with faces of you or your friends to create videos that depict the transition from childhood to adulthood, or even to try on various outfits from different eras or countries.

Using AI Video
To use AI Video, simply launch the app, navigate to the AI Video tab, and select your preferred style. Then, follow the app's instructions to upload images and generate AI videos.

AI Avatar Creation
The app also offers an AI Avatar feature, which is user-friendly and straightforward. You only need to select and upload 10-20 of your photos. Your personal AI will craft an enhanced avatar, offering a new version of yourself unlike anything you've seen before. This might give you inspiration for new makeup looks or how to use filters differently.

Using AI Avatar
Using AI Avatar is a breeze. Just launch the app, go to the AI Avatar tab, start the process, and upload 10-20 photos. After that, all you need to do is wait for the AI to process and generate the photos. The app also allows for cropping and editing within its interface, making it easy to create numerous personalized AI avatars.

AI Image Generation Features
The AI image generation feature of this app allows for the easy creation of images just by entering a desired picture in text form and pressing the generate button. Users can specify styles and reference images to create pictures in their preferred style. The app can even generate unique 'Irasutoya' style images, a speciality of this AI Picasso app. In addition to that, there are options to generate images in various styles such as fantasy, charcoal, 3D games, cyberpunk, synth, and oil painting. Blink Captions by Vozo AI.description:
Leveraging the power of AI, Vozo AI Video Creator (Formerly known as Blink Captions) enable you to generate, edit, and translate talking videos, featuring auto captions with 200+ styles, avatar video generation, AI edit, AI teleprompter, AI script writing, and AI translate! With Vozo AI (Blink Captions), you can make stunning talking videos 10x easier!

Here's the full set of features offered by Vozo AI (Blink Captions):

AI Captions: 
Use speech-to-text technology to auto-add captions with 99.97% accuracy, significantly improving the engagement of your short form or long form videos from YouTube videos, Shorts, TikTok, to Instagram Reels. Vozo AI (Blink Captions) supports 118 languages and 200+ styles that are 100% customizable at the sentence or batch level.

Avatar Video Generation:
Create personalized avatars from existing videos. Then, simply add scripts to generate impressive talking videos! Vozo AI (Blink Captions) also offers a rich avarat library for your choice. 
Talking Photos Generation:
Turn images into talking videos and create memes easily with Vozo AI! Upload a video and add a script or a recorded audio. You can let portraits, anime, or animals speak up!


AI Translate: 
Select your original and target languages, click "translate," and your video with translated subtitles is ready for export! Vozo AI (Blink Captions) support 118 languages and dialects.

Captions Presets: 
Cool captions styles make your videos or reels eye-catching! Vozo AI (Blink Captions) offers 200+ presets for your choice, including font, color, size, background, and animations. All styles can be further modified.

AI Trim: 
In one click, Vozo AI (Blink Captions) can remove filler words and silent parts from both your captions and video, making talking video or reel editing super easy, smooth, and fluent!

AI Zoom: 
Mark the area you want to stand out in your talking video and when you want it to pop in the captions. Vozo AI (Blink Captions) will automatically zoom into this area at your specified timing. 

AI Highlight: 
You can also choose to highlight any part of your captions, and Vozo AI (Blink Captions) will automatically apply the styles for you.

AI Title
Get automatic, personalized talking video titles that fit right into your content. Let Vozo AI (Blink Captions) help you create attractive titles!

AI Teleprompter
Forget memorizing scripts. Our prompter automatically scrolls at your talking speed. when recording talking videos, allowing natural delivery and eye contact.

AI Script Writing
Jot down your thoughts, and our AI turns them into a finished script, allow you to focus on delivering your message with Vozo AI (Blink Captions)!

Download Watermark-Free Videos
Download watermark free videos from Tiktok and other social media and repost for free!

AI Denoise and Isolate Vocal from Audio for talking videos
Vozo AI (Blink Captions) can identify human voices from complicated audio and isolate the vocal part from audio. You can choose to keep or remove the human voice for further video editing. 

Lyrics Mode: Accurately Add Lyrics for Music Videos
From Pop to Rap, Vozo AI (Blink Captions) accurately detects and transcribes the lyrics for your music videos.

Photo Blend
Merge faces, pets, or products into anime, portraits, or showcase visuals—then animate them into talking videos. Fast, fun, and creative storytelling starts with a blend.

AI Background
Blur your background or switch it in real-time with Vozo AI (Blink Captions)' virtual green screen. No need for physical green screens or additional editing.

Fun Emojis, GIFs & Sound Effects
Vozo AI (Blink Captions) spice up your talking videos with emojis, GIFs, and sounds—all it takes is a click.


We can't wait to see what you'll create with Vozo AI (Blink Captions)! Should you have any feedback or suggestions, contact us at blink-support@vozo.ai.

Shorts AI - Video Creator App.description:
Bring Your Ideas to Life with Shorts AI Video Creator – The Easiest Way to Create Stunning Videos!

Say goodbye to complicated video editing tools. With Shorts AI Video Creator, creating professional-quality videos is as easy as typing your idea! Whether you’re a content creator, business owner, or just someone with a vision, you can quickly turn your concepts into polished videos using free stock footage, premium voiceovers, and your own media uploads.

New Features:
16:9 Landscape & 9:16 Portrait Support – Create videos in your preferred format.
Multiple Languages Support – Generate videos in different languages.
Dynamic Captions & Subtitles – Auto-generate subtitles for accessibility and engagement.
Multiple Voices Support – Select from a variety of premium and free voices.
Music Support – Enhance your videos with background music.

Key Features:

	•	Prompt-Based Video Creation: Simply input your idea, and Shorts AI app video creator will generate a full video for you.
	•	Extensive Stock Footage Library: Access a wide range of free and premium clips to match your vision (premium clips require a paid membership).
	•	Premium Voiceovers: Choose from top-tier voice options to narrate or enhance your video (premium voices available with a paid membership).
	•	Upload Your Own Media: Personalize your videos with images, videos, or audio from your own collection.
	•	Fast and Intuitive: No need for complex tools—our simple interface lets you create videos in minutes.
	•	Fully Customizable: Tweak your video’s visuals, audio, and style until it’s perfect.
	•	Perfect for Any Project: Social media, business promos, personal projects, ads, and more!

Turn your creativity into shareable videos effortlessly. Whether you’re making a quick clip or a full production, Shorts AI makes the process simple, fast, and fun. Download now and start creating!

Get Started in 3 Easy Steps:

	1.	Download Shorts AI Video Creator
	2.	Create an account
	3.	Enter your video idea or prompt.
	•	Customize with stock footage (free and premium), voiceovers (free and premium), or your own media.
	•	Save, export, and share your masterpiece!

With the free version, you can export a limited number of minutes per month, with watermarks included in the videos.

To remove watermarks and export at higher resolutions, upgrade to one of our paid membership plans, which includes:

	•	60 to 200 minutes per month of video creation using Shorts AI
	•	2GB to 10GB personal uploads storage
	•	Unlimited access to premium stock footage (Storyblocks, Pixabay, Pexels, and more)
	•	Access to premium voices
	•	Upload your own content (in-scene editing)

Your Vision, Our Tools—Let’s Create!

Zeemo:AI video maker & Caption.description:
Zeemo 2.0 is launch now — with powerful new feature: the AI Faceless Video Generator. Boost your video views by 10x on social media with ease.
Beyond AI video generation, Zeemo has also made efforts in the field of subtitling. 
Zeemo still delivers highly accurate auto subtitling. You can also edit videos, add music, and more—all in one place. With Zeemo, creating viral video for social media has never been easier.

Why Choose Zeemo to Make AI Videos and Add Subtitles to Videos？
1. Get 10X video views on social media. On YouTube, YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, TikTok or Facebook, eye-catching AI videos can easily hit millions of views—getting 10x more views is totally possible.
2.  Get more followers to your channel. Subtitles help viewers understand your video in any situation, while bilingual subtitles can expand your audience to a global scale.
3. Increase your video completion rate and get more algorithm recommendations.Videos with subtitles often capture viewers' attention and encourage them to watch until the end. Social media platforms are also more likely to recommend videos with subtitle tags.

Here are the core features of Zeemo:
·AI Faceless Video - Transform any ideas into engaging, publish-worthy videos effortlessly. Complete with AI voiceovers, stunning AI images, dynamic captions, and unique AI-generated music in just one click.
·AI Captions - Automatically add captions to your videos. Support batch edit the captions with our easy-to-use editor
·Dynamic Templates - Boost views with trendy subtitle templates like Mr. Beast, Alex Hormozi etc. 
·AI Translate: Automatically translate captions in 110+ languages.
·AI Emoji, GIFs & Stickers
Automatically add emojis to your captions, and you can also add GIFs or stickers that make your video more engaging and fun! 
·Template - We offer pre-made subtitle templates and you can also create your own
·Highlight - Highlight any words you want on the subtitle
·Trim - Easily trim your videos to any desired length
·Music - Add multiple audios and adjust volume
·Video length - up to 5 hours supported
·Video quality - Maximum 4K quality supported

ABOUT SUBSCRIPTION
- We charge for automatic captions and AI vIdeo generation by deducting the credits from your account.
- Subscribe for Pro access to all features.
- Subscription renews automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Auto-renewal may be turned off in the user's Account Settings after purchase.
